page.title: 14A CHILD'S DAY
page.content: WRITTEN BY ONE OF THE SECOND YEAR PUPILS AT DIDCOT GIRLS' SCHOOL. BEGINNING AT 6.15 A.M. I CLEAN OUT AND FEED MY PONY ,AND TURN HIM OUT INTO THE FIELD. I RETURN HOME AND GET READY FOR SCHOOL.I EAT BREAKFAST ONLY OCCASIONALLY. I PUT MY RABBIT AND GUINEA -PIG INTO THE GARDEN AND CATCH THE BUS AT 8.10 A.M..AT DIDCOT GIRLS' SCHOOL THERE ARE SIX LESSONS, A BREAK AND A LUNCH-TIME.I CATCH THE BUS HOME AT 3.40 P.M.. MY MOTHER IS UNEMPLOYED, BUT GOES TO YOGA AND PEACE-GROUP MEETINGS.MY FATHER RETURNS HOME AT 5 P.M..AFTER FINISHING HOMEWORK AND RIDING MY PONY,I GO TO BED.
